title: Please let me pass bootcamp!
post_body: I have always loved the idea of coding. I know there is so much to learn in a few short months. I just hope and pray I can pass this class.

title: The Power of Tiktok
post_body: It's amazing what you can learn from this social media platform, such as retirement tips, cooking hacks, and world news. Sometimes you have to take it with a grain of salt because there is also a lot of misinformation.
